greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the positive solution to n = Sum_{d|n} a(d) * a(n/d).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537 (first 1000 terms from Andrew Howroyd)
formula: a(n) = A046644(n)/A006519(n). - _Andrew Howroyd_ and _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2018
Multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2^A011371(e), a(p^e) = 2^A005187(e) for odd primes p.
Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 2^(((1+A000035(p))*e)-A000120(e)) for all primes p.
program: (PARI) a(n)={my(v=factor(n)[,2]); denominator(n*prod(i=1, #v, my(e=v[i]); binomial(2*e, e)/4^e))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 09 2018
(PARI) A299150(n) = { my(f = factor(n), m=1); for(i=1, #f~, m *= 2^(((1+(f[i,1]%2))*f[i,2]) - hammingweight(f[i,2]))); (m); }; \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 03 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 03 2018
